snippet: The Carlyle Group, a private equity firm in Washington, said Friday that it had acquired an 85 percent stake in Ri Happy, Brazil’s largest toy chain, for an undisclosed amount.
lead_paragraph: The Carlyle Group, a private equity firm in Washington, said Friday that it had acquired an 85 percent stake in Ri Happy, Brazil’s largest toy chain, for an undisclosed amount.
